name: Jai Bhatia
headline: Customer-facing technologist specializing in technical sales and applied AI
summary: Customer-facing technologist specializing in technical sales and applied AI, with experience designing enterprise solutions and delivering over 30 virtual demos for banking and insurance clients. Skilled at leveraging automation and AI-enabled workflows to advance sales opportunities and generate qualified meetings across digital channels. Proven collaborator with marketing and ecosystem teams, translating customer needs into pilots and product enhancements.

experience.description: Technical sales and enterprise solution design.
achievements: Led technical discovery across QA, IT, security, and business teams to define success criteria, integrations, and pilot scope for enterprise evaluations, demonstrating product sales proficiency
Designed and delivered 30+ virtual technical demos for banking and insurance customers, leveraging technical demo delivery to advance accounts into technical validation and pilot stages

Built a production-grade automation workflow using n8n to ingest target accounts, enrich decision-makers, generate focused outbound messages, optimize digital channels, track state, and post summaries to Slack, creating a repeatable path to qualified meetings
Synthesized insights from 50+ customer and prospect conversations into clear product requirements, contributing directly to three roadmap features that shipped
Created reusable demo kits and walkthroughs to standardize technical storytelling, showcasing product sales proficiency and reducing preparation time
Supported pilots and handoffs with customer success and partners using documented architectures, runbooks, and acceptance criteria in a high-volume sales environment to shorten time to first value

experience.description: ML and GenAI for QA automation and test authoring.
achievements: Shipped a screen classification model used in automated testing workflows, improving UI element detection accuracy by 2%
Co-developed a test case prioritization engine that reduced enterprise regression runtimes by 10% using historical signals and risk ranking
Prototyped GenAI-based test authoring using LangChain and retrieval from product specifications, reducing manual test creation and accelerating release cycles
Worked closely with product, engineering, and customer-facing teams to productionize ML features used in real enterprise environments

education.institution: University of California, San Diego - Rady School of Management

education.field: Mathematics and Economics, Minor in Business

personalProjects.name: SignalNote
achievements: Built ingestion pipelines for CSV and Google Sheets
Shipped an interactive dashboard using Supabase and the OpenAI API

personalProjects.name: Personal Website
personalProjects.description: Production portfolio built with Next.js and TypeScript.
achievements: Includes contact API and content ingestion
Achieved Lighthouse accessibility and SEO scores between 95 and 100
